title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to create a JAR file using the packager, the process fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: When using the JAR packager, the process of creating a JAR file fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' when the finish button is pressed.
EB: When using the JAR packager, the process of creating a JAR file should complete successfully without any errors or warnings.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the JAR packager in the application
2. Select the files to be included in the JAR
3. Click on the finish button to create the JAR
4. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'
